xml:
Elleste Solo<tm tmtype="reg"/> MX Indications and dose

Menopausal symptoms

By transdermal application

  • Adult

    Apply 1 patch twice weekly continuously, started within 5 days of onset of menstruation (or at any time if cycles have ceased or are infrequent), to be used with cyclical progestogen for 12–14 days of each cycle in women with a uterus, initiate therapy with MX 40, subsequently adjust according to response.

Osteoporosis prophylaxis

By transdermal application

  • Adult

    Apply 1 patch twice weekly continuously, started within 5 days of onset of menstruation (or at any time if cycles have ceased or are infrequent), to be used with cyclical progestogen for 12–14 days of each cycle in women with a uterus, initiate therapy with MX 80, subsequently adjust according to response.

 Patient and carer advice

Patients should be advised on the application of Elleste Solo MX patches.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
